attributes.action: British Flag for the British Army - The EU flag has no place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government are yet again chipping away at something British.

The British Army is renound for being the best army in the world and have been more commited to operational success than any EU country, thus having every right to proundly fly the British flag on operations.

They now want to get in on the reputation of our Forces by flying the EU flag on our Naval ships, Army vehicles and RAF.

Not only is this an insult and to the people of Britain but it is an insult to British forces. It is yet another attempt to supress all things British.

Will you stand up for the identity of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and its forces?
